text: “Ndipo (Allah) analuzanitsa pakati pa mitima yawo (poika chikondi pakati pawo). Ngati ukanapereka zonse za m’dziko lapansi (ncholinga choti uwaluzanitse mitima yawo mwa iwe wekha) sukadatha kuluzanitsa pakati pa mitima yawo. Koma Allah adaluzanitsa pakati pawo. Ndithu Iye Ngwamphamvu zoposa Ngwanzeru zakuya
